mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USED_PRODUCT(BOARD_NO, PRICE, TRADE_METHOD, LOCATION_NO, PRODUCT_NAME) VALUES(#{boardNo}, #{price}, #{tradeMethod}, #{locationNo}, #{productName})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , TRADE_METHOD , IS_SOLDOUT , LOCATION_NO , LOCATION_NAME , CATEGORY_S_NAME , CATEGORY_S_NO , CONTENT , CREATE_DATE , READ_COUNT , TITLE , B.USER_NO , WISH_COUNT , NICK_NAME , LOGIN_METHOD , M.CHANGE_NAME AS PROFILE_IMG , IMG_NO , I.CHANGE_NAME AS IMG_CHANGE_NAME , I.ORIGIN_NAME AS IMG_ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_LEVEL , I.STATUS FROM USED_PRODUCT U JOIN LOCATION L USING(LOCATION_NO) JOIN BOARD B USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN IMAGE I USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN SUB_CATEGORY S USING(CATEGORY_S_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ${bNo} AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
